tooltip.minecardmod.cards.zombie: ETB: Play every zombie from your hand and deck.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.bat2: ETB: Your opponent draws a card.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.creeper: Explodes if another creature is placed in the melee zone.
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.mushroom_cow: ETB: Generate a mushroom soup in your hand
tooltip.minecardmod.cards.mushroom_soup: Mushroom soup: Fully heal an entity
